rooms.description: A welcoming area with a reception desk and display shelves.
Spacious living room with natural light, designed for relaxation.
Modern dining area integrated into the living space.
Fully-equipped kitchen with industrial design elements and ample storage.
Luxury master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, designed for restful sleep.
Two additional bedrooms accommodating family members or guests.
Comfortable guest room for visitors, with a small balcony.
Dedicated study area designed with ergonomic seating and ample workspace.
Includes laundry, storage closet, and a small pantry.

levels.notes: Design integrates Vastu principles by aligning the main entrance with an auspicious direction and ensuring ample natural light. The industrial aesthetic is balanced with spacious, modern living areas, complemented by a large garden area and private swimming pool on the property.

rooms.description: Multi-purpose room for additional workspace or recreational use.
Secondary bedroom option on the mezzanine level, offering a quiet retreat.

openings.location: central core of the ground floor

levels.notes: Mezzanine level ensures a seamless flow with the main floor and provides an opportunity to experiment with industrial design elements, such as exposed beams.

rooms.description: Luxury suite that spans the penthouse level, offering panoramic views and an open layout.
Spacious outdoor living area for relaxation, designed with industrial chic elements.

levels.notes: Penthouse level is designed with a focus on luxury and open space, incorporating Vastu principles by ensuring a direct view towards the east for auspicious energy.

rooms.description: A dedicated outdoor space integrated into the garden, ideal for relaxation and gatherings.
Luxurious swimming pool area with deck space and seating.

levels.notes: The outdoor area is designed to be an extension of the indoor living space, blending industrial aesthetics with a lush garden and modern pool features.
